subject: Re: More loops
body:
On 6/28/07, Jenda Krynicky  wrote:
> From: "Amichai Teumim" 
snip
> > foreach $elem (@array){
> >   print "$elem\n";
> > }
>
> This can be simplified to
>
> print join("\n", @array), "\n";
snip

or (since this is Perl and TIMTOWTDI)

print map { "$_\n" } @array;

--
